body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Scott Automotive. My name is Wayne Scott. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Natalie Coleman.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Natalie. Could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, seven eight nine, four three two one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Natalie. And can you also share your email address with me?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing your contact details, Natalie. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm having a billing issue related to my recent service appointment.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand that billing concerns can be frustrating. Let's work together to resolve it. Thank you for sharing this with me, Natalie. I will look into this matter for you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Natalie. Have a great day!
